item.title: About
item.description:
I’m tracking the pull:
What is attention, and how does it shape our lives?
What are our desire lines — the ones we follow and the ones we bury?

This project is a way to track the signals of Eros across the layered terrain of a lived experience, and with the spellcasting powers of language, find a way to see and say the barely seen and said: the movement towards aliveness.
